info.name: Trade Me for Netbooks
info.description: A compact Trade Me theme optimised for netbooks & tablets with a screen resolution of 1024x600px. Restyled by zANavAShi, who does most of her recreational surfing in Firefox on a Lubuntu netbook.
info.additionalInfo: Please note that my layout is optimised primarily for buyers who surf the general listing sections, so some Trade Me features may be hidden or relocated to the screen edges in order to minimise scrolling and maximise the auction details view. My CSS code is a work in progress, and I am receptive to constructive ideas which might further enhance the user experience of smaller screened surfers. May the source be with you ={^;^}=
